title: SEC Charges 4 Companies Over Misleading SolarWinds Cyberattack Disclosures
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has charged four current and former public companies for making "materially misleading disclosures" related to the large-scale cyber attack that stemmed from the hack of SolarWinds in 2020.
